Content:: The General Fono is the parliament of Tokelau. It has 20 members (15 before 2008), representing the 3 atolls. Elections are held every three years. Tokelau is a de facto non-partisan democracy since both village and Fono elections are made without political parties.[1]  This legislature-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This Tokelau-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
